cause: a number of unhygienic practices at the bakery
source: contamination of the bakery water supply
detection: the personnel department of a large bakery in South Wales notified the local Environmental Health Department
mitigation: alerting all EHDs in South Wales via EPINET (an electronic mail network used for epidemiological surveillance)
the general public by means of a news release
title: A Community Outbreak Of Food-Borne Small Round-Structured Virus Gastroenteritis Caused By A Contaminated Water Supply
